description: Turbine availability losses, including downtime for maintenance and repairs.
Balance of plant availability losses, including shutdowns of the entire wind farm.
Grid availability losses, excluding curtailment issues.
Electrical losses, including transformer and cable losses.
Wind farm consumption losses, including auxiliary power consumption.
Sub-optimal performance losses, e.g., turbine underperformance for unknown reasons.
Power curve losses, for example due to incorrect verification.
Losses due to icing on the blades.
Blade degradation losses, for example due to erosion.
Blade degradation due to exposure changes.
Sector management losses as an operational strategy to reduce wakes.
